CustomField.formula: IF( PNG_WarrantyExpiryDate__c >= TODAY() , IMAGE("/sfc/servlet.shepherd/version/renditionDownload?rendition=ORIGINAL_Jpg&versionId=0685C000000Mdds&operationContext=CHATTER&contentId=05T5C000000P671", 'Green Flag', 70, 70 ) , IF( PNG_WarrantyExpiryDate__c < TODAY(), IMAGE("/sfc/servlet.shepherd/version/renditionDownload?rendition=ORIGINAL_Jpg&versionId=0685C000000Mddn&operationContext=CHATTER&contentId=05T5C000000P66r",'Red Flag', 70, 70), null))
CustomField.label: Warranty Flag
